title: EDII Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Various Manager Posts
description: Entrepreneurship Development Institute of India (EDII) has published the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, MBA, can grab this chance and apply for the EDII Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of applicat...
